ROWNUM <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE RN > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GOODS_TBL WHERE CATE_CODE_CHILD = #{cate_code_child} AND
GDS_CODE > 0
